events.message: I received the wrong size for the jacket I ordered and I would like to request a refund because it does not fit me at all.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request related to incorrect sizing and an exchange or money back.
This case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Lisa for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help with your refund request for the jacket you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the jacket and the order number to process your refund quickly?
I have attached the photos showing the size label and the jacket itself, the order number is 458263.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you can expect the amount to be credited within 5 business days.
Thanks a lot for the quick response and resolving the issue swiftly. I appreciate the support.
The refund has been processed and we consider your case resolved. Please check your account in a few days.
We wanted to follow up and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback about your experience with our refund process.
